en.description: A grenade that reverses gravity in a 1m radius, inflicting 20 Impact Damage. Target sustains additional damage based on the amount sustained while airborne.

ru.description: A grenade that reverses gravity in a 1m radius, inflicting 20 Impact Damage. Target sustains additional damage based on the amount sustained while airborne.

ko.description: A grenade that reverses gravity in a 1m radius, inflicting 20 Impact Damage. Target sustains additional damage based on the amount sustained while airborne.
